function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid delivery of medicines and supplies using drones","Impact":"Overreliance on drone delivery leading to inefficiency in traditional medical supply chains","Mitigation":"Implement a hybrid approach combining drone delivery with traditional supply chain methods","Technologies":"Drone obstacle avoidance and advanced navigation technology","People":"Healthcare staff, hospitals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, drone service providers"},{"Description":"Use of drones for crowd surveillance and disinfection","Impact":"Privacy concerns and public distrust, potential misuse of surveillance data","Mitigation":"Transparency in drone usage, strict regulations on data collection and storage","Technologies":"Drone surveillance and disinfection technology","People":"General public, government authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, drone service providers"}]}
